body_html: torch.slogdet should be able to give you the determinant. However, certain modifications (minor, I think) have to be made to enable batching for torch.slogdet and torch.logdet. I'll try to get it done in a few days. Unfortunately, btrifact_with_info (which is required for efficient determinant computation) is only implemented for 3D tensors. This makes the task slightly more complicated, and I can't get to it at the moment.

body: ~`torch.slogdet` should be able to give you the determinant. However, certain modifications (minor, I think) have to be made to enable batching for `torch.slogdet` and `torch.logdet`. I'll try to get it done in a few days.~ Unfortunately, `btrifact_with_info` (which is required for efficient determinant computation) is only implemented for 3D tensors. This makes the task slightly more complicated, and I can't get to it at the moment.
